name: My Dice, My Choice!
description:
Hello. 

"My Dice, My Choice" is a simultaneous turn-based dice game where you can allocate different chances to each side of your dice to make different strategies.

It's a level-based against computer AI, and you must reach the finish line to win.

There are 4 actions on the sides of your dice, and you have to set a HIGH, MEDIUM, or LOW chance on each side by your decision.

Here is the definition of each action:

1-  makes a barrier along your opponent's road for 1 turn, which prevents your opponent from moving forward for that turn.

2-  clears the possible barrier along your road and move one step forward.

3- move two steps forward if there ain't no barriers.

4-  if you are behind, move three steps forward. If you are ahead, stand in place.

*The goal is to reach the end before your opponent does. If you reach the last spot at the same time, it is drawn, but if one had more steps after that spot, that would be the winner.

You need to analyze the allocation of your opponent's dice and make a plan against what would be the actions that go on with that dice. So you simply try to neutralize the possible advantage of the opponent by giving a suitable allocation of chances to every action of your dice.

Well Done.
